pages.title: Geothermal Core
pages.text: The ultimate heat source. Warms a 12-block radius with +50°C and no fuel required — permanent, infinite heat.$(br2)Place deep underground (below Y=0) for full effectiveness. Above Y=0, range and temperature are halved.$(br2)Right-click to open the upgrade interface.
A Frozen Heart at the center, flanked by Thermal Cores, surrounded by diamond blocks and obsidian.

pages.title: Upgrading the Core
pages.text: The core has three upgradeable stats. Place materials in the upgrade slots — they are consumed permanently.$(br2)$(l:bold)Range$(/l) (max 32 blocks):$(br)$(li)Obsidian: +1 block per$(br)$(li)Diamond Block: +4 blocks per$(br2)$(l:bold)Temperature$(/l) (max +100°C):$(br)$(li)Blaze Powder: +5°C per$(br)$(li)Thermal Core: +10°C per$(br2)$(l:bold)O₂ Production$(/l) (3 levels):$(br)$(li)Nether Star: +1 level per$(br)Levels: 16 → 20 → 26 → 32 block radius
